column6: CAROL'S 100TH SOLO ISSUE ANNIVERSARY SPECIAL! - We're celebrating 100 issues of Carol Danvers' high-flying, smack-talking, and butt-kicking adventures, thanks to you our beloved Carol Corps! Join writer Kelly Sue DeConnick and artists David Lopez, Marcio Takara and more as we bring you a momentous (and over-sized) issue almost 50 years in the making!
column8: | writer:Kelly Sue DeConnick | penciller (cover):David Lopez | artist:Marcio Takara
